Author: Azure Automation Product Team
Summary: This runbook looks for a specific event ID in an Azure VM so that an action could be taken. It should be used with the Manage-MonitorRunbook runbook. Please refer to http://azure.microsoft.com/blog/2014/11/17/monitoring-azure-services-and-external-systems-with-azure-automation
Title: Sample monitor runbook to watch for event IDs in an Azure Virtual Machine.
